summary1_1A.text:
During a "GOAT Tour of India" in December 2025, Lionel Messi visited Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai, and finally New Delhi. In Delhi, his activities included:

*   An exhibition match.
*   A stage event.
*   A football clinic for children.
*   Several high-profile private meetings, including potential meetings with the Prime Minister, Chief of Defence Staff, and Chief Justice of India.
*   He was gifted T20 World Cup tickets, Team India jersey, and bat by ICC chairman Jay Shah in Delhi.

summary2_1A.text: According to the CNN article, Lionel Messi visited India in 2025. After his appearance at the Vivekananda Yuva Bharati Krirangan stadium in Kolkata, fans ripped up seats, and the tour organizer was detained by police.
